body.title: Your Questions Answered
body.subtitle: Everything you need to know about visiting Riomaggiore from practical travel tips to local insights.

features.title: Is Via dell'Amore Open?
features.description: Check current status as it closes periodically. Alternative high route available when closed

features.title: Where to Park?
features.description: Limited parking above village. Best to park in La Spezia and take the train (10 min)

features.title: How Long to Visit?
features.description: 2-3 hours minimum for village. Full day if hiking to Manarola or exploring thoroughly

features.title: Best Photo Spots?
features.description: Harbor area, Via dell'Amore entrance, castle viewpoint, and sunset from sanctuary

features.title: Are There Beaches?
features.description: Rocky swimming areas, not sandy beaches. Harbor has small platforms for sunbathing

features.title: Do I Need Cash?
features.description: Cards widely accepted but bring cash for small shops, cafes, and Cinque Terre trail pass
